subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The home favorite Lleyton Hewitt survived a stunning collapse in the early hours of Sunday morning to beat Marcos Baghdatis, 4-6, 7-5, 7-5, 6-7 (4), 6-3.
snippet: The home favorite Lleyton Hewitt survived a stunning collapse in the early hours of Sunday morning to beat Marcos Baghdatis, 4-6, 7-5, 7-5, 6-7 (4), 6-3.
